name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (Gamer_V1nce)
description:
My Submission for the scratch game jam #1

https://itch.io/jam/scratch-game-jam-01

⭐ CONTROLS ⭐ WASD - Move Left Click - Shoot R - Reload Space + Left Click - Grenade E - Heal Pause button - Settings

⭐ GAMEPLAY ⭐ Zombies are attacking! Survive all the waves to win. Collect magazines to continue shooting, collect bandages to heal and throw grenades for splash damage.
